oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Slim Rhodes And His Mother's Best Mountaineers radio show - #166 - WMC
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Slim Rhodes And His Mountaineers (styles as Slim Rhodes And His Mother's Best Mountaineers) radio show for WMC-AM, Memphis, Tennessee, sponsored by Mother's Best flour. Listed as show #166 as part of the daily Slim Rhodes And His Mother's Best Mountaineers radio show. Mentioned band members include Slim Rhodes, Speck Rhodes, Dusty Rhodes and Brad Suggs. WMC-AM announcer Trent Wood.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Slim Rhodes; Mountaineers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Test tones -- Opening statement (Trent Wood) -- Opening theme -- Slim Rhodes and Speck Rhodes talk and introduces Dusty Rhodes -- Wake Up Susan (Dusty Rhodes fiddle) -- Mother's Best plug (Slim Rhodes and Speck Rhodes) -- Slim Rhodes introduces the next tune -- I'll Never Let You Go (Little Darlin') (Slim Rhodes) -- Trent Wood introduces the comedy routine -- Skunk Hollow comedy routine (Slime Rhodes and Speck Rhodes) -- Trent Wood talks and introduces the next tune -- Sweet Temptation (Brad Suggs) -- Mother's Best plug (Slim Rhodes and Speck Rhodes) -- Slim Rhodes talks and introduces the next tune -- [Unidentified fiddle tune] (Dusty Rhodes fiddle) -- Closing statements -- Closing theme
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WMC-AM (Radio station : Memphis, Tenn.); Slim Rhodes And His Mountaineers; Rhodes, Dusty (Musician); Rhodes, Slim; Rhodes, Speck;
